Bananas are berries, but strawberries are not.
Honey never spoils; edible honey has been found in ancient tombs.
Sharks existed before trees.
Octopuses have three hearts.
Sloths can hold their breath longer than dolphins.
Your stomach gets a new lining every few days to avoid digesting itself.
Sea otters hold hands while they sleep so they don’t drift apart.
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus.
Wombat poop is cube-shaped.
There’s enough DNA in your body to stretch to the sun and back 600 times.
Water can boil and freeze at the same time (called the triple point).
Pineapples take about two years to grow.
Butterflies can taste with their feet.
Some turtles can breathe through their butts.
Cows have best friends and get stressed when separated.
Jellyfish are 95% water.
Otters have a favorite rock they use to crack open shellfish.
Elephants can “hear” with their feet by sensing vibrations.
A group of flamingos is called a ‘flamboyance’.
There are more stars in the universe than grains of sand on Earth.
